message.body: Whoa what's with all of the plays?
The girl I'm dating is in the play
it's good though! i wouldn't want to see it again if it wasn't!
and it's close to you
Is it Shakespearian? I'm at Shannon's bridal shower now, I don't know when I will be west, what time does it start?
i didnt even know that she was having a bridal shower!
when/how did you get invited?
it doesnt start until 8
man, i hate being out of the McBride loop
that's why i was in a shitty mood yesterday. i feel like an outsider :(
Aw, you aren't outside. There is no inside honey.
Lol ok.
Thx :)
I do miss seeing you tho, stupid semester
We had a good run the first couple of weeks! Lol. Lets gym it up soon. Milk Bryn Mawr for all it's worth while we can lol
I would love to gym Monday and or Tuesday. I get too caught up in the snags at school, I need to remember the gym haha
Same. The connection between gym and productivity does not always seem direct but it's a strong enough correlation between mind and body to be sound :)
And our butts were so fit, don't forget that part
Lol
Speaking of butts...how did I not know about that wedding shower?! Does Shannon not like me or something? I'm totally butt hurt
I don't know, I figured I was invited because I was her heller and now we have the familial bond. I don't think you should be hurt tho
Invites to things like that are weird
I think she likes you as much as she likes any of us, you've just been doin your own thing. Don't stress it
I really want to work on my abs
And arms
Total body workout! Lol
Yes!!!! My arms are getting sad. Butt, abs arms
Also, my lower back needs strengthened
I want to use the weight machines but I don't know how
Horse riding is kicking my ass this semester I need to strengthen my core and my legs. We've been riding stirrupless and I'm dying
Oh shit that's intense!! Yes let's figure out the weights !
Yeah, the only thing that is tricky is that depending on the muscle u are working, the amount of weight varies. Like sometimes it doesn't seem very strenuous but it's right, doyouknowwhatimean?
Yea if you use too much weight it changed the motor axons you're stimulating so that you can create more force when really you are seeking to target the motor axons that deal with specificity
BAM SCIENCE
Yes!! Science workout!
Or you just end up targeting the wrong muscles period
Yeah,I want to target them all! I wish the gym had a steam room
Right?
Are you interested in being a McBride Customs Person?!
I think it will be a fun way to get involved & we could use a customs group! We talked a little bit about it at SGA
I want to be more involved and I remember you expressing feeling similarly, want to team up & be customs peeps?

Aren't Kim and Noa teaming up for customs? I told them they got my vote. I'm going to be silent partners with Lija and Adrienne, I've been working a lot this week on advocacy. My meeting with Christina really motivated me, because she didn't give me any o
I think we are all going to be able to have a voice next year, it's not going to be like this year with just a two person team
Noa and Kim are doing traditions
We don't actually have anyone in customs
But I'm glad you are feeling empowered!
Oh right, what are customs then?
Haha
Customs are for the first week of school to orient people. All the other students have organized things to do
Yeah, the idea of doing two more years at part time was discouraging to say the least
But the responsibilities were kind of put on Brig & Shannon
Yea I'm sorry :(
But I think it would be nice to do a proper customs!
Generally they are also the like social workers of the team. But for traditional students, even transfers, it's different
And I totally support Noa & Kim doing traditions. They will be great
Can I call you?
Have fun being domestic :)
Sorry hanging up curtains with Nate, lets talk during gym tomorrow and after. When can u meet?
Haha thanks, now the neighbors can't see me naked
Sucks for them
When is our funding thing due again?
Ugh I don't know, end of April? I don't know what to do
Come work on the farm w me :)
You can couch it in some anthropological terms & they are involved with like every other non profit in Philly! So it can be a good networking opp. Plus you'll be tan and get free produce!
If you can't find something else of course
I know, I need to decide this week. A farm would be nice. Whatcha doing?
I won't be at the gym until after class, which ends at four
Are u alive?
Hey sorry my phone was dead
Didnt expect to be off campus as long without it! The Urban Tree Connection is the group
No problem, ad thanks I will look it up tonight. I need this semester to be over now
Same
What was the gardening group you've worked with before?
Mill creek. They are super cool. I thought about writing them.
Nice. Got a sec to chat internships quick?
are you around at all today?
Hey sorry, yes I will be around after five. I have to study for a test on the couch
Hahahahahahaha nice
Are u around today?
Sorta. U?
I need to go to whole foods!
Big plans for the day lol. & date later!
Blarg!
That sounds better than my day. I have a test at one I'm not prepared for and then class until four. Blarg
Done is good. Get through it & prepare for the next thing :)
I know. It's going to be a shit show, but I may be able to fake it. Somehow I can't do readings unless under extreme pressure
Where are you now? Are you cramming?
Yes, pathetically. In dalton on the third floor. I don't want to be seen by any classmates in carpenter haha
Ha!
Aww good luck! I'd offer to stop & say hi but I don't want to distract you
Thanks, it will all be over soon ; )
That test is over!
Yay come over!!!!
Ok! Are you getting ready for your date?
Yes
Ooo la la
I'm hoppin in the shower. Come in and make yourself at home!
